1.0.name: wordpress/euraxess-job-vacancies
1.0.description: EURAXESS Job Vacancies Widget is a portable module bringing EURAXESS functionalities to your website. With this widget you can show the latest or most viewed Job Vacancies published on EURAXESS directly on your website. The widget is developed to be automatically adapted to the width of your sidebar. To find a fully customizable mini application interacting with EURAXESS jobs Portal please visit http://ec.europa.eu/euraxess/index.cfm/jobs/miniApp
